about.title: About Burger Cafe
about.subtitle: Our story began 20 years ago, when our love for delicious burgers led us to this path

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Burger Cafe started in 2004 with a simple dream: making the best burgers in town. Ahmad Mohammadi, our founder, with 20 years of cooking experience, decided to establish a restaurant where quality and taste are the priority.
story.p2: From the very first days, we committed to using the best ingredients and preparing every burger with love and care. This commitment made us popular among people quickly.
story.p3: Today, after 20 years, we still adhere to our original principles and try to provide a better experience for our dear customers every day.
